snippet: WIESEL--Elie. The Friars Club mourn the loss of their esteemed member Elie Wiesel. A truly great man. Jerry Lewis, Abbot; Larry King, Dean; David Cornstein, Prior; Bruce Charet, Scribe 1/3...
lead_paragraph: WIESEL--Elie. The Friars Club mourn the loss of their esteemed member Elie Wiesel. A truly great man. Jerry Lewis, Abbot; Larry King, Dean; David Cornstein, Prior; Bruce Charet, Scribe 1/3
